verbose_text: Our gene expression analysis frequently revealed the reduced expression of BMP2 and the WNT family in the MSCs obtained using the RIA technique from the femur in comparison with MSCs obtained from the iliac crest by fine-needle aspiration, although it has been reported that the mechanical load induces the rapid expression of BMP-2, cbfa-1 and smad5, which further enhances the gene expression of ALP, collagen type 1, osteocalcin and osteopontin.
